Imma be honest here, it's def. for those people who like stratedgy, but not for those of us who like a little action and gun-play. The concept and dialog or however the fuck you spell it, was funny so that was a bonus. I haven't fully complete the game yet but let me tell you, this is a game to keep you on your toes cause I was too fucking lazy to figure some shit out so I went to some walkthroughs. Check the game out, or don't, idgaf either way.

one of the best first person puzzle games out there!

I just beat the game, and I have to say that I enjoyed it thoroughly.  A few puzzles were more interesting than they were difficult, but several of them really had me stuck.  I tried using a controller, but being a PC gamer means that I am much better acclimated to using the mouse and keyboard.  Everything flowed smoothly with a minimum of loading times upon entering a new area.  Very atmospheric and very enjoyable.  I also liked the humor of the robot enemy throughout the game.  Beat it in 4.6 hours.  10/10

Engaging puzzle game played level-by-level with proper learning curve, which - after some time - takes interesting turn.
Nearly perfect combination of gameplay, audiovisual style and a piece of story. Also, great sarcasm humor.
Game is short, but its length seems just right.

I didn't know what to write about in my review, so here's a recipe for pancakes instead:

1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
3 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
1 teaspoon salt
1 tablespoon white sugar
1 1/4 cups milk
1 egg
3 tablespoons butter, melted

1. In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butter; mix until smooth.

2. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot.

Welcome to the Aperture Science Enrichment Center. Portal is an excellent game, fun and beautiful. The goal is to success chambers test with only an object which is Portal gun and your intelligence. With the Portal gun you can create portals on walls and you can then across them to access new spots and proceed in the chamber test.
Portal sound like an exercise school. At the beginning you start with easier chamber test and it will become more and more difficult. If you're courageous, you can try advanced maps and Portal challenges. You will really enjoy or not. :)
游戏自带简体中文，这是一个非常具有创意的游戏，需要你去观察、去思考、去突发奇想、去大胆尝试，当然也还有一些细微至极的操作，你会发现乐在其中，配合剧情和音乐，就像是喝着咖啡读者一本好书，一个人玩也好玩，基友联机一起玩更好玩，值得推荐

One of the best first person games ever made in the history of video gaming. Amazing idea which was executed brilliantly. A completely different approach to puzzles which requires a lot of thinking and patience of course. Don't waste your time on walkthroughs. That's the beauty of this game. You might spend hours on some test chambers but trust me, this game's worth every second you spend on it. Puzzles have never been so fun. 

10/10 will shoot portals again.

Maybe a bit over long in the second part and uneccessarily difficult towards the end, but really nice all the same.

/ Don't believe anything they tell you about the cake. It's a lie. /

This game definitely is a must-have. One of the best games I've played so far. I really enjoyed (and still enjoy) playing this. It's a game everyone could enjoy, in my opinion. 

The storyline itself took me about 2 to 3 hours to complete. The additional challenges and advanced chambers are nice features, great for adding some game time and a challenge for those who like getting all achievements.

The chambers and puzzles get harder smoothly as you advance through the game.  However, it can get a tiny bit repetitive. The portal mechanism really makes this game unique. I really love the smooth physics. Good graphics. The music and sound are okay. The dialog is simply brilliant and hilarious. Through the game, there are several nice additions (random radios playing the catchy theme song, messages from other test subjects) which caused me to laugh from time to time.

Portal 2, the sequel, is in my opinion even better, but you just have to play Portal before you start on the sequel. Together, they're a masterpiece.

I highly recommend buying this game. It's definitely worth the money. If it's in sale, do not hesitate and buy it immediately (bonus points if you buy Portal 2 too)!
Loved It!
Einfach tolles Spiel :)

我是玩了Portal2再来玩的一代，纯粹是为了来补全剧情，一代其实也蛮好，就是Glados少了一份人情味，不过毕竟一代嘛，设定方面不太全面，所以二代的Glados特别讨人喜欢（我是说讨抖M的喜欢2333）
游戏方面，当穿过两个都垂直打在地面的传送门时，镜头的旋转特别容易造成晕眩= =，视角转过来太慢了，在二代中很好的改善了这一点。
还有就是，里面利用能量球的机关有点难，解谜瞎猫摸死耗子的感觉..好几个地方我都是让能量球乱弹来触发机关的。
一代还附送的挑战关卡~~不过特别难！！特别特别难！！但是我觉得这是个很好的附加品，不知道为什么二代取消了。
Ps.一代结尾的歌比二代的歌好听~~~一代的Glados有种不谙世事的萝莉音，二代就有了一种女王音，这算是Glados的成长么2333

Did I enjoy this game?
[b]Definite yes.[/b]

Do I recommend this game?
[b]Definite yes.[/b]

When should you buy it?
[b]When you can.[/b]

[u]Summary Review[/u]
Quirky dialogue, creative puzzles and amazing storyline, this is a game that should not be passed up, especially if you like thinking "out of the box" puzzles.

[u]Detailed Review[/u]
I got this game on sale with the Orange Box sale for $5, and honestly, I feel ashamed for not having played this game sooner. Without spoiling too much for those  7 other people that haven't played yet, this game basically takes place in a testing area where you are tried to complete a series of puzzles. And that's pretty much the premise of the game.

This game is short, but boy does it deliver.

And if you're a person with humor, you'll enjoy this puzzle game from start to finish.
Epic...

[h1]"Another short little game..."[h1]

 I was so innocent back then.

Portal is not a game that you play when you wait for a discount season, it's a game that will challenge you. I'm going to tell some general aspects:

[b]Story[b]
This is a Valve game and they have an original way to transmite their in-game story, basicly, if you go to fast and don't care about it this game is going to be empty, but if you dedicate your time for listening to GlaDOS and discover the "secret chambers" it's a deep story where the ambition of a company it's the principal cause of its own destruction. With one of the best villians in videogame, this is an amazing story that everyone must know if they want to be involved in gaming industry and not being just a "gamer".

[b]Gameplay[b]
The most characteristic part of the game is one of the most recognized gun in videogame: The [i]Portal Gun[i]. It would not sound interesting in a beginning, but offers a new whole dimension of gaming, playing with real physic's concepts like "momentum" that are really necessary at the time of completing the game.

[b]I completed the principal story, now what?[b]
Well, the game offers a lot of achivements dedicated to:
1.Complete the advanced chambers that are going to test your skills and your mental ability.
2.Many challenges like completing a chamber with least time or portals.
3.Some [i]in-side[i] story challenges like destroying all the cameras in-gaming.

If you consider yourself a lover of the industry, ether you like platforms games or games that challenges you, this is your game.

Final Score: 10/10
Valve'nin beğenerek oynadığım en güzel oyunu bence. Bulmacaları olsun, portallar açıp kendimize bakabilmek olsun, oyun çok güzeldi. Herkese tavsiye ederim.

Paso de ser un simple MOD a ganarse un hueco en el corazón de los más jugones. Haciendo gala de una imáginación y jugabilidad envidiables ha llegado a convertirse (Posteriormente con Portal 2) en uno de los estandartes de Valve a pesar de que la idea ni siquiera surgio de ellos.

Sinceramente es un juego que HAY que jugar, ya que aporta un dinamismo y una visión del juego que demuestra que con poca cosa (Esta versión es bastante simple) se puede hacer un impresionante juego.

You get a portal gun that you shoot with left and right clicks of the mouse. You are put into chambers where you have to figure out how to get through it, using these portals that can be opened on most surfaces.

Great game!

Portal is one of the very few games out that are not only great but are also NOT ABOUT KILLING THINGS (Take that people who think that games are nothing but violence). Portal offers a unique playstyle for gamers interested in the first person expierance and does well with the challenged represented with the use of portals. Glados is one of the my all time video game villians and everything she says is just damn right hilarious. However the replay value for this game is low and the only reason for anyone to come back and play this is just relive the expierance in killing Glados again. Even at that this game can easily be beaten in a Saturday afternoon so best to wait for a sale to arrive for the price to drop.

9/10
